extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites     Level 3 or above in a KINE or PHED Plan and KNPE254.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from KNPE253; KNPE354

basic.description: An introduction to occupational biomechanics and physical ergonomics. The course will apply principles of biomechanics to describe relationships between job demands, functional/tissue capacities and work-related injury. Demand, capacity and injury risk evaluation tools will also be presented.
basic.subject: KNPE
basic.title: Occupational Biomechanics and Physical Ergonomics
